headline: Clarence Thomas is a politician, says Lawrence O'Donnell last night
sentences:
He gave these reasons:
Thomas posed with Herschel Walker, a Republican candidate trying to run against Democrat Senator Raphael Warnock.
Thomas was the only Justice to vote against releasing White House documents from the National Archive to the J6 Committee.
